inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: intravenous recombinant tissue plasminogen activator (t-PA) was administered

exclusion.criterion: alcohol use in the last 8 hours
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week

exclusion.criterion: STEMI or presumed cardiac chest pain
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy or with a known allergy to nitroglycerin
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
